test_id: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 06 Dec 2022 Shift 2__6960f326ed11a81e6e8cc2ee
test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 06 Dec 2022 Shift 2__6960f326ed11a81e6e8cc2ee

questions.original_question: If X &times; Y means that X is the father of Y, X &divide; B means that X is the mother of B, X &ndash; Y means that X is the brother of Y then which of the following expression shows that A is the father of C?

english.explanation: To establish that A is the father of C, we analyze each option. Option 4: A × B means A is the father of B, and B – C means B is the brother of C. Since A is the father of B and B is the brother of C, A must also be the father of C. Other options involve relationships like uncle (option 1) or grandfather (option 3), which do not satisfy the requirement.

hindi.explanation: A × B का अर्थ है A, B का पिता है। B – C का अर्थ है B, C का भाई है। इस प्रकार A, C का पिता होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at AB as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_SSC_Amit%20A%20_03-03-2023_D5.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image across line AB requires flipping the original figure horizontally. Option 3 correctly reflects this transformation by reversing the left and right sides of the figure relative to the mirror line AB.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब दर्शाता है कि आकृति AB पर दर्पण रखे जाने पर दाईं ओर की ओर दर्पण बदल जाता है। सही प्रतिबिम्ब विकल्प 2 में है।

english.explanation: Octagon has 8 sides, so it is related to 'Eight'. Similarly, Heptagon has 7 sides, making 'Seven' the correct answer. The relationship is based on the number of sides in the polygon.

hindi.explanation: अष्टभुज में 8 भुजाएँ होती हैं, इसलिए सप्तभुज में 7 भुजाएँ होंगी।

english.explanation: The pattern is (first number + third number)^3 = middle number. For (5, 512, 3): 5 + 3 = 8, 8^3 = 512. Similarly, (2, 125, 3): 2 + 3 = 5, 5^3 = 125. This matches the given set and option 2.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth term in the same way as the first term is related to the second term and the fifth term is related to the sixth term.</p>

<p>10 : 45 :: ? : 28 :: 11 : 55</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves multiplying the first number by a gradually increasing multiplier. 10 × 4.5 = 45 and 11 × 5 = 55. For the middle term, the multiplier is 3.5: 8 × 3.5 = 28. Thus, 8 is the correct answer.

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>+ and &divide;</p>

english.explanation: Swapping '+' and '÷' in option 2: 9 ÷ 3 × 2 – 8 + 1 = 3 × 2 – 8 + 1 = 6 – 8 + 1 = –1. This satisfies the equation. Other options do not yield the correct result after swapping.

hindi.explanation: चिह्न + और ÷ को बदलने पर समीकरण बनता है: 9 ÷ 3 × 2 – 8 + 1 = –1।

english.explanation: Observing the rows: 243 ÷ 9 = 27 (but 9 is in the third column). 108 ÷ 9 = 12 (third column is 6). 48 ÷ 4 = 12. The pattern is first ÷ third = second. For the third row: 48 ÷ 4 = 12, so the missing number is 12.

questions.original_question: <p>In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of ( &ndash; ) is related to the number of the right side of ( &ndash; ) with some Logic / Rule / Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic / Rule / Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. ( NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 &ndash; Operations on 13 such as adding / subtracting / multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed )</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is (number × 7) + 4. For 6: 6 × 7 + 4 = 46 (not 33). For 12: 12 × 7 + 4 = 88 (not 141). For 10: 10 × 7 + 4 = 74 (not 97). For 8: 8 × 7 + 4 = 60. Only option 1 fits this rule.

hindi.explanation: अन्य युग्म में संख्याएँ n × (n - 1) + (n - 3) का अनुसरण करती हैं, लेकिन 6 – 33 इस नियम का अपवर्तन करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two numbers, from amongst the given options, should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>14 + 39 - (&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{144}\)</span>&nbsp;&divide;&nbsp; 4&nbsp;) + ( 5 &times; 3 ) - 6 = 63</p>

<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark ( ? ) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_SSC_Amit%20A%20_03-03-2023_D43.png" style="width: 474px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of increasing complexity in shapes with alternating elements. Option 2 logically continues the sequence by adding the next shape in the progression.

hindi.explanation: आकृति शृंखला में मोड़ने और घुमाने के अनुसार विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?

english.explanation: MNG, STM, and HED follow a pattern where each letter cluster has letters in alphabetical order (M, N, G; S, T, M; H, E, D). ABU breaks this pattern as A, B, U are not in order.

hindi.explanation: MNG, STM, HED में अक्षर क्रमागत रूप से हैं, जबकि ABU इस नियम का अपवर्तन करता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;NULLIFY&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;MFOLRUB&rsquo; and &lsquo;SKYWALK&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;HPBWZOP&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;FLAGGER&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code replaces each letter with its reverse in the alphabet (A=Z, B=Y, etc.) and shifts by one. For 'FLAGGER', F→U, L→O, A→Z, G→T, G→T, E→V, R→I. Thus, the code is UOZGTVI.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को उलटा अक्षर के साथ बदला गया है, जैसे F→U, L→O आदि।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark ( ? ) in the given series?</p>

<p>121, 169, 289, ?, 529, 841</p>

english.explanation: The series consists of squares of prime numbers: 11²=121, 13²=169, 17²=289, 19²=361, 23²=529, 29²=841. The missing term is 19²=361.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Dog : Bitch :: Stallion : ?</p>

english.explanation: Dog : Bitch is a male-female pair. Similarly, Stallion : Mare is the correct pair. Doe (female deer), Vixen (female fox), and Goose are unrelated.

hindi.explanation: कुतिया कुत्ता की बच्चा है और घोड़ी घोड़ा की बच्चा है।

questions.original_question:
<p>The positions of the same cubical block are shown. When &#39;6&#39; is at the top, which number will be at the bottom?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_SSC_Amit%20A%20_03-03-2023_D19.png" style="width: 202px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a cube, opposite faces cannot be adjacent. From the given views, 6 is opposite 4. When 6 is on top, 4 must be on the bottom.

hindi.explanation: एक पासा में विपरीत फलकों पर संख्याओं का योग 7 होता है। अतः 6 के ऊपर 5 नीचे होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the options figure which is embedded in the given figure as its part ( rotation is NOT allowed ).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_SSC_Amit%20A%20_03-03-2023_D21.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The embedded figure must fit as an exact part of the main figure without rotation. By analyzing the proportions and shapes of the options, option 3 matches a section of the main figure when aligned correctly.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न में दी गई आकृति के हिस्से को छोटे आकार में प्रस्तुत किया गया है। घूर्णन अनुमति नहीं है इसलिए विकल्प 1 (46x46 पिक्सेल) आकृति के सीधे हिस्से के रूप में संगत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark ( ? ) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_SSC_Amit%20A%20_03-03-2023_D28.png" style="width: 432px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of alternating rotation and addition of elements. Option 3 aligns with the sequence by continuing the established rotational direction and adding a new element systematically.

hindi.explanation: आकृति शृंखला में अगला चरण तत्वों के विन्यास को बदलने और नियमित रूप से आवर्तन करने पर आधारित है। विकल्प 2 दिए गए पैटर्न का अगला चरण है।

options.value: Only conclusions I and II follow
Only conclusions II and III follow
Only conclusions I and III follow

english.explanation: From the statements, Some mice are keyboards and All keyboards are CPUs, we conclude Some mice are CPUs. Since All mice are webcams, Some webcams are keyboards. Additionally, All keyboards are CPUs implies Some webcams are CPUs. Thus, conclusions I and II follow.

hindi.explanation: कथनों के अनुसार, सभी माइस वेबकैम हैं और कुछ माइस कीबोर्ड हैं (जो सीपीयू हैं)। निष्कर्ष II और III तार्किक रूप से अनुसरण करते हैं, जबकि निष्कर्ष I सीमित है।

english.explanation: After swapping × and –, and 4 and 5, the equations become: I. 9 ÷ 3 – 6 + 5 × 4 = 17 and II. 5 × 4 – 3 + 6 ÷ 2 = 20. Following order of operations yields the correct results.

hindi.explanation: चिह्न और संख्याओं को बदलने के बाद समीकरण (I) = 17 और समीकरण (II) = 20 प्राप्त होते हैं। गणना: I. 9 ÷3 -6 +5×4 = 17, II. 4 -5 ÷3 +6×2 = 20।

english.explanation: The alphabetical order is determined by comparing letters sequentially. The correct order is Miscalculate (2), Miscall (4), Mischance (3), Miscellaneous (1), and Miscasting (5). Option 2 matches this sequence.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों का वर्णक्रम अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के अनुसार है: Miscalculate (2), Miscall (4), Miscasting (5), Miscellaneous (1), Mischance (3)।

english.explanation: From the family relations, L is the son of M, who is the mother of N. N is the sister of O, who is the brother of P. Thus, L is the brother of P.

hindi.explanation: L @ M – N $ O % P से स्पष्ट है कि L, P का भाई है क्योंकि M, N की माता है और N, O की बहन है, जो P का भाई है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which letter - cluster will replace the question mark ( ? ) to complete the given series?</p>

<p>MDSA, KERC, ?, GGPG, EHOI</p>

english.explanation: The letter cluster follows a pattern where each letter position decreases/increases by a specific value. The missing term is IFQE (option 1), derived by analyzing the alphabetical positions of each letter.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर की स्थिति 2 द्वारा कम हो रही है। अगला अक्षर-समूह IFQE है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, BELOVED is coded as 65, and FLOWER is coded as 79. How will QUIVER be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The code is the sum of alphabetical positions of letters. QUIVER sums to 17+21+9+22+5+18 = 92. Option 1 (92) matches.

hindi.explanation: BELOVED (65) और FLOWER (79) के अक्षरों के योगफल के आधार पर QUIVER = 17+21+9+22+5+18 = 92।

options.value: Both conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: The statements do not provide a logical link between O and Q or between M and Q. Neither conclusion can be definitively derived.

hindi.explanation: कथनों से स्पष्ट है कि Q और O समान रूप से M के भाग हैं लेकिन लुप्त निष्कर्ष नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>NDRF, NZJT, NVBH, NRTV, ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern in the series involves decreasing second letters by 4 each time (D→Z→V→R→N) and alternating third letters. The missing term is NNLJ (option 3).

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में अगला पद NNLJ है क्योंकि अक्षरों की स्थिति नियमित रूप से घट रही है।

questions.original_question: Baishakhi, the famous festival of Sikhs, is celebrated in which month every year?

english.explanation: Baishakhi, a Sikh harvest festival and the start of the new year, is celebrated in April (Vaisakh month) to mark the harvest season and the formation of the Khalsa by Guru Gobind Singh in 1699.

hindi.explanation: बैशाखी सिक्खों का प्रमुख धार्मिक त्योहार है जो वैशाख मास के शुक्ल पक्ष के प्रथम दिन मनाया जाता है। भारतीय सौर कैलेंडर के अनुसार, यह त्योहार प्रतिवर्ष अप्रैल के पहले या दूसरे सप्ताह में पड़ता है। इसलिए बैशाखी का आयोजन अप्रैल महीने में होता है।

questions.original_question: Chola inscriptions mention several categories of land, which of the following land was known as gifted to temples?

english.explanation: The Chola dynasty inscriptions refer to 'Devadana' as land gifted to temples. 'Brahmadeya' was land given to Brahmins, while 'Shalabhoga' and 'Pallichchhandam' relate to other land classifications.

hindi.explanation: चोल शिलालेखों में मंदिरों को उपहार में दी गई भूमि को 'देवदान' कहा जाता था। 'देव' का अर्थ भगवान या देवता से है, इसलिए इसे भगवान को दान देने के रूप में दर्शाया गया था। अन्य विकल्पों में शालभोग आर्थिक प्रतिबंधित भूमि और ब्रह्मदेय विद्वानों को दी गई भूमि को संदर्भित करते हैं।

questions.original_question: Who was sworn in as the Central Vigilance Commissioner (CVC) by President Droupadi Murmu in August 2022?

english.explanation: Suresh N. Patel was sworn in as Central Vigilance Commissioner by President Droupadi Murmu in August 2022, succeeding the previous appointee.

hindi.explanation: अगस्त 2022 में राष्ट्रपति द्रौपदी मुर्मू ने सुरेश एन. पटेल को केंद्रीय सतर्कता आयुक्त (CVC) के रूप में शपथ दिलाई। यह नियुक्ति उनके पूर्व पद के तत्काल बाद की गई थी और उनकी नियुक्ति लंबित अध्ययनों के बाद की गई।

questions.original_question: The appointments committee of cabinet ( ACC ) extended the tenure of current Research and Analysis Wing ( RAW ) chief for another year, till June 30, 2023. Who is the current chief?

english.explanation: Samant Kumar Goel, the Research and Analysis Wing (RAW) chief, had his tenure extended by the Appointments Committee of the Cabinet until June 30, 2023.

hindi.explanation: कैबिनेट की नियुक्ति समिति (ACC) ने मुकुल रोहतगी के कार्यकाल को 30 जून 2023 तक बढ़ा दिया। वर्तमान में राष्ट्रीय अनुसंधान एजेंसी (RAW) के प्रमुख के रूप में उनका कार्यकाल जारी था। अनिल चौहान पूर्व प्रमुख थे।

questions.original_question: How many times did India organise the Commonwealth Games?

english.explanation: India hosted the Commonwealth Games in 1982 (Delhi), 2010 (Delhi), and 2022 (Bengaluru), making it three times.

hindi.explanation: भारत ने राष्ट्रमंडल खेलों का आयोजन दो बार किया है: 1982 में दिल्ली और 2010 में मुंबई। यह आयोजन खेलों के इतिहास में भारत की महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: Identify a dark-coloured amorphous substance that is highly resistant to microbial action and undergoes decomposition at an extremely slow rate.

english.explanation: Humus is a dark, amorphous organic material in soil formed from decomposed plant and animal matter. It resists microbial breakdown and decomposes very slowly.

hindi.explanation: ह्यूमस गहरे रंग का अक्रिस्टलीय पदार्थ है जो मिट्टी में जीवांत अपघटन के परिणामस्वरूप बनता है। यह सूक्ष्मजैविक क्रियाओं के लिए प्रतिरोधी होता है और अत्यंत धीरे-धीरे अपघटित होता है।

questions.original_question: How many Indian states shares its border with Bangladesh?

english.explanation: India shares its border with Bangladesh through five states: West Bengal, Assam, Meghalaya, Tripura, and Mizoram.

hindi.explanation: भारत बांग्लादेश के साथ पाँच राज्यों - पश्चिम बंगाल, असम, मेघालय, त्रिपुरा और मिजोरम के साथ अपनी सीमा साझा करता है। ये राज्य दोनों देशों के सीमा पर स्थित हैं।

questions.original_question: Established in 1867 at Bombay, the ________ sought to remove caste restrictions, abolish child marriage, and encourage the education of women, etc.

english.explanation: The Prarthana Samaj, founded in 1867 in Bombay, aimed to reform Hindu society by abolishing caste discrimination, child marriage, and promoting women's education.

hindi.explanation: 1867 में मुंबई में स्थापित प्रार्थना समाज ने जाति प्रतिबंधों को हटाने, बाल विवाह को समाप्त करने और महिलाओं की शिक्षा को बढ़ावा देने की मांग की। यह एक प्रगतिशील सामाजिक आंदोलन था।

questions.original_question: A Hindu festival celebrated by the Tamil community that falls in the Tamil Solar Month is called?

english.explanation: Thaipusam is a significant Hindu festival celebrated by Tamil communities during the Tamil month of Thai, involving processions and acts of devotion.

hindi.explanation: थाईपुसम हिंदू धर्म का एक प्रमुख त्योहार है जो तमिल कैलेंडर के थाई महीने में मनाया जाता है। यह त्योहार विशेष रूप से तमिल समुदाय द्वारा पूजा और धार्मिक रस्मों के साथ मनाया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Goods and services tax (GST) became operational from <u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>.

english.explanation: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) in India became operational on July 1, 2017, replacing multiple indirect taxes with a unified system.

hindi.explanation: वस्तु एवं सेवा कर (GST) 1 जुलाई 2017 से भारत में लागू हुआ। यह एक महत्वपूर्ण कर सुधार था जो देश में पूर्णरूपेण कर निर्माण के लक्ष्य को प्राप्त करने के लिए लागू किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following was known as an organisation of merchants in the inscriptions of the Pallavas?

english.explanation: The Pallavas referred to merchant guilds as 'Nagaram,' which played a crucial role in trade and economic activities during their rule.

hindi.explanation: पल्लव शिलालेखों में व्यापारियों के संगठन को 'सभा' कहा जाता था। यह व्यापारिक समूह के प्रबंधन और नियंत्रण को दर्शाता था। अन्य विकल्प जैसे 'नगरम' शहर के लिए थे।

questions.original_question: Sundaram Balachander has been the main player of which of the following musical instruments?

english.explanation: Sundaram Balachander is renowned for his expertise in playing the Mridangam, a traditional South Indian percussion instrument.

hindi.explanation: 10 अप्रैल 2022 तक पुदुचेरी के मुख्यमंत्री वी. वैथिलिंगम थे। उनकी नेतृत्व भारतीय नेशनल कांग्रेस (इंडिपेंडेंट) के अंतर्गत होता था।

questions.original_question: As of 10 April 2022, who among the following is the Chief Minister of Puducherry?

english.explanation: As of April 2022, N Rangasamy served as the Chief Minister of Puducherry, overseeing the Union Territory's administration.

hindi.explanation: क्षोभमंडल पृथ्वी के वातावरण की सबसे नीचे की परत है जिसकी औसत ऊंचाई लगभग 13 किलोमीटर होती है। यह ऊंचाई भूमध्यरेखा पर अधिक होती है और ध्रुवों पर कम।

questions.original_question: What is the average height of troposphere?

english.explanation: The troposphere's average height is approximately 13 km, varying from ~8 km at the poles to ~17 km at the equator due to thermal expansion.

hindi.explanation: मिल्क ऑफ मैग्नेशिया (Mg(OH)₂) एक प्रबल क्षार है जिसका pH मान लगभग 10 होता है। यह एक विशिष्ट एंटीएसिड है जो पेट से संबंधित समस्याओं के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: pH of milk of magnesia is <u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

english.explanation: Milk of magnesia (magnesium hydroxide) is a strong base with a pH of approximately 10, used as an antacid and laxative.

questions.original_question: The real executive power is vested in the Council of Ministers with the ________ as its head.

english.explanation: In India, the Council of Ministers is the real executive authority, with the Prime Minister as its head. The President is the nominal head of state, while the Prime Minister leads the government and holds actual executive power.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संविधान में मंत्रिपरिषद का नेतृत्व प्रधानमंत्री करते हैं। यह वास्तविक शासनिक शक्ति होती है क्योंकि मंत्रिपरिषद के अपने फैसले प्रधानमंत्री के नेतृत्व में ही लिए जाते हैं। राष्ट्रपति और अन्य विकल्प वास्तविक निर्णय लेने वाले नहीं होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which singer was given the Padma Shri in 2022 under the Arts category?

english.explanation: Sonu Nigam received the Padma Shri in 2022 for his contributions to music. Kumar Sanu and Udit Narayan had already received Padma awards earlier, and Abhijeet Bhattacharya was awarded the Padma Bhushan in 2017.

hindi.explanation: 2022 के पद्म अवार्ड्स में कला वर्ग के तहत कुमार सानू को पद्मश्री सम्मानित किया गया था। अन्य गायकों को पिछले वर्षों में पुरस्कृत किया गया था (जैसे सोनू निगम 2020 में)।

questions.original_question: What is the numerical value of a physical quantity?

english.explanation: The numerical value of a physical quantity is referred to as its magnitude. Direction is relevant for vectors, distance is a scalar quantity, and reference is unrelated to the numerical value of a physical quantity.

hindi.explanation: कोई भौतिक राशि उसके परिमाण और इकाई के संयोजन से मापी जाती है। संख्यात्मक मान उस राशि के परिमाण को दर्शाता है, जबकि दिशा और सन्दर्भ अन्य गुण हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">In March 2022, Tripura government announced&nbsp;</span><u style="">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u><span style="">&nbsp;reservation for women in government jobs.</span>

english.explanation: In 2022, the Tripura government announced a 33% reservation for women in government jobs, aligning with the national policy of gender equity in public employment.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2022 में त्रिपुरा सरकार ने सरकारी नौकरियों में महिलाओं के लिए 33% आरक्षण की घोषणा की। यह संघ सरकार के 2022 के आरक्षण नीति से अनुरूप है।

questions.original_question: In 1849, the Paramhans Mandali was established to work for the abolition of &lsquo;Caste&rsquo; at&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>.

english.explanation: The Paramhans Mandali, established in 1849, was a reformist society based in Bombay (now Mumbai) that aimed to abolish caste discrimination and promote social equality.

hindi.explanation: 1849 में परमहंस मंडली की स्थापना बॉम्बे में हुई थी। इसका उद्देश्य जाति प्रथा के उन्मूलन के लिए कार्य करना था। लाहौर और कलकत्ता के अन्य संगठनों से जुड़े हैं।

questions.original_question: In football, when the ball strikes the frame of the goal or the referee and remains within the goal and touch lines, it is:

english.explanation: In football, if the ball strikes the goal frame or referee and remains within the field boundaries, the play continues. This is not considered a foul or out-of-play.

hindi.explanation: फुटबॉल में यदि गेंद गोल के फ्रेम या रेफरी से टकराती है और गोल और टच लाइन के भीतर रहती है, तो इसे स्टिल इन प्ले माना जाता है। फाउल या मिस्कंडक्ट की घटना नहीं होती।

questions.original_question: The Indian Institute of Remote Sensing was established at ______.

english.explanation: The Indian Institute of Remote Sensing (IIRS) was established in Dehradun in 1962 to train professionals in remote sensing and geospatial technologies.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय सुदूर संवेदन संस्थान (IRS) की स्थापना देहरादून में की गई थी। यह उपग्रह आधारित भू-संवेदन के अध्ययन में विश्वविद्यालय के तौर पर स्थापित है।

questions.original_question: &#39;Modernisation&rsquo; as a goal of planning in context of the Indian economy was NOT aimed at:

options.value: increase in production of goods and services

english.explanation: Modernisation in India's economic planning focused on technological advancement, increased production, and social reform. Adapting a Western lifestyle was not a stated objective.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय अर्थव्यवस्था के नियोजन में आधुनिकीकरण का लक्ष्य वस्तुओं और सेवाओं के उत्पादन में वृद्धि, नई तकनीक और सामाजिक दृष्टिकोण में परिवर्तन था। पश्चिमी जीवनशैली सीधे लक्ष्य नहीं था।

questions.original_question: In 1664, who discovered the fifth star in the Trapezium, an asterism (mini-constellation) in the constellation Orion?

english.explanation: Robert Hooke discovered the fifth star in the Trapezium cluster in 1664. This discovery was part of his observations of the Orion Nebula.

hindi.explanation: क्वाशिओरकर - प्रोटीन की कमी (d), कमजोर अस्थियाँ - कैल्शियम की कमी (c), एनीमिया - आयरन की कमी (b), घेंघा - आयोडीन की कमी (a)। यह सही सुमेलन है।

english.explanation: Kwashiorkor is caused by protein deficiency (d), weak bones and muscles by calcium deficiency (c), anemia by iron deficiency (b), and goiter by iodine deficiency (a).

hindi.explanation: कॉलम A और B में सही सुमेलन: क्वाशिओरकर - प्रोटीन की कमी (d), कमजोर अस्थियाँ - कैल्शियम की कमी (c), एनीमिया - आयरन की कमी (b), घेंघा - आयोडीन की कमी (a)। यह सही क्रम है।

questions.original_question: How many circles can be drawn that pass(es) through two fixed points?

english.explanation: A circle passing through two fixed points can have its center anywhere along the perpendicular bisector of the line segment joining the two points. Since the perpendicular bisector is an infinite line, there are infinitely many possible centers, each defining a unique circle. Thus, an infinite number of circles can pass through two fixed points.

hindi.explanation: दो निश्चित बिंदुओं से होकर अनंत वृत्त खींचे जा सकते हैं। वृत्त के केंद्र को उन दो बिंदुओं के मध्य के लंबवत द्विभाजक पर रखा जा सकता है, जो अनंत बिंदु हो सकते हैं।

questions.original_question: If x is the mean proportional between 12.8 and 64.8, then the value of x is:

english.explanation: The mean proportional between two numbers a and b is calculated as x = √(a × b). For 12.8 and 64.8: x² = 12.8 × 64.8 = 829.44. Taking the square root gives x = √829.44 = 28.8. This matches option 3.

hindi.explanation: मध्यानुपाती x का मान दो संख्याओं के गुणनफल का वर्गमूल होता है। x² = 12.8 * 64.8 = 829.44, इसलिए x = √829.44 = 28.8।

questions.original_question: If cot A = 15 / 8, then what will be the value of tan 2 A?

english.explanation: Given cot A = 15/8, we first find tan A = 1/cot A = 8/15. Using the double-angle identity for tangent, tan 2A = 2 tan A / (1 - tan² A). Substituting tan A = 8/15: numerator = 2*(8/15) = 16/15, denominator = 1 - (64/225) = 161/225. Thus, tan 2A = (16/15) ÷ (161/225) = (16/15)*(225/161) = 3600/2415 = 240/161 (simplified by dividing numerator and denominator by 15).
key_concepts: Double-angle formula for tangent: tan 2A = 2 tan A / (1 - tan² A)

hindi.explanation: cot A = 15/8 दिया गया है, इसलिए tan A = 8/15। tan 2A के लिए सूत्र 2 tan A / (1 - tan² A) का उपयोग करें। गणना करने पर, tan 2A = 240/161 प्राप्त होता है।

english.explanation: To calculate the percentage, divide the number of participants from state L by the number of participants from state J and multiply by 100. State L has 500 participants and state J has 200 participants. (500 ÷ 200) × 100 = 2.5 × 100 = 250%. This means the number of participants from L is 250% of those from J.

hindi.explanation: राज्य L से सर्वेक्षण में भाग लेने वाले व्यक्तियों की संख्या 500 है और राज्य J से 200 है। इसलिए, अभीष्ट प्रतिशत निकालने के लिए हम सूत्र का उपयोग करेंगे: (L के व्यक्ति / J के व्यक्ति) × 100 = (500 / 200) × 100 = 250%।
key_concepts: सारणी से डेटा पढ़ना और समझना

english.explanation: To solve this, first calculate the sum of temperatures on Monday and Tuesday: 20° + 45° = 65°. Then calculate the sum of temperatures on Friday and Saturday: 25° + 55° = 80°. The difference between these two sums is 80° - 65° = 15°. Hence, the correct answer is 15 degrees.

hindi.explanation: सोमवार और मंगलवार का योग = 20 + 45 = 65, शुक्रवार और शनिवार का योग = 25 + 55 = 80। अंतर = 80 - 65 = 15 डिग्री।

questions.original_question: 3<sup>50</sup> + 9<sup>26</sup> + 27<sup>18</sup> + 9<sup>28</sup> + 9<sup>29</sup>&nbsp;is divisible by which of the following integers?

english.explanation: The expression is converted to base 3: 3^50 + 3^52 + 3^54 + 3^56 + 3^58. Factoring 3^50 gives 3^50(1 + 3^2 + 3^4 + 3^6 + 3^8) = 3^50 * 7381. Checking divisibility of 7381 by the options: 7381 ÷ 11 = 671 (no remainder), so the entire expression is divisible by 11. The other options (5,7,2) leave remainders when testing divisibility.

questions.original_question: A car with a price of ₹6,50,000 is bought by making some down payment. On the balance, a simple interest of 10% is charged in lump sum and the money is to be paid in 20 equal annual instalments of ₹25,000. How much is the down payment?

english.explanation: Let the down payment be D. The balance amount is ₹6,50,000 - D. Simple interest of 10% is applied to this balance, making the total repayment amount (6,50,000 - D) × 1.10. This total is divided into 20 equal installments of ₹25,000, resulting in a total repayment of ₹5,00,000. Solving for D: (6,50,000 - D) × 1.10 = 5,00,000 → D = 6,50,000 - (5,00,000 / 1.10) ≈ ₹1,95,455.

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper has 2220 kg of rice. A part of which he sells at a 20% profit and the rest at a 12% profit. He gains 18% on the whole. The quantity ( in kg ) sold at a 12% profit is:

english.explanation: Let the quantity sold at 20% profit be x kg. Then, the quantity sold at 12% profit is (2220 - x) kg. The total profit equation is: 0.20x + 0.12(2220 - x) = 0.18 * 2220. Solving this gives x = 1665 kg. Thus, the quantity sold at 12% profit is 2220 - 1665 = 555 kg. Verification using alligation (ratio of 3:1 for 20% and 12%) also confirms 555 kg.
english.key_concepts: Profit and Loss, Alligation Method, Linear Equations

questions.original_question: Choose the correct statement from the following.

options.value: HCF is the least common multiple of the given numbers.
HCF of two or more numbers is the highest number which perfectly divides all the given numbers.
HCF is also called the least common divisor.
In prime factorisation method of HCF, the multiples of all the given numbers are listed.

english.explanation: The Highest Common Factor (HCF) is defined as the greatest number that divides all the given numbers without leaving a remainder. Option 2 correctly states this. Option 1 confuses HCF with LCM (Least Common Multiple). Option 3 incorrectly labels HCF as 'least common divisor,' which is not a standard term. Option 4 misdescribes the prime factorization method, which involves identifying common prime factors, not listing multiples.
key_concepts: Distinction between HCF and LCM (Least Common Multiple)

hindi.correct_answer: 2. दो या दो से अधिक संख्याओं का HCF, वह सबसे बड़ी संख्या होती है जो दी गई सभी संख्याओं को पूर्णत: विभाजित कर देती है।
hindi.explanation: HCF (उच्चतम सामान्य भाजक) दी गई संख्याओं का सबसे बड़ा सामान्य गुणनखंड होता है जो सभी को पूर्णता से विभाजित करता है।

english.explanation: To solve (J1 – J2), calculate the average production of P and R (J1) and Q and T (J2) using their percentage shares from the pie chart. Subtract J2 from J1 after converting percentages to actual values using the total production of 12,000. The difference between the sums of percentages for P+R and Q+T determines the result. For example, if P+R = 30% and Q+T = 24%, their difference is 6%, leading to (6% of 12,000)/2 = 360. The correct answer is 360.

hindi.explanation: जीवा के केंद्र से दूरी की गणना करें: 40 सेमी की जीवा के लिए दूरी 15 सेमी, 30 सेमी की जीवा के लिए 20 सेमी। न्यूनतम दूरी 20 - 15 = 5 सेमी।

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{a}{b} + \frac{b}{a}\)</span>&nbsp;= 1 and a + b = 2, then the value of a<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ b<sup>3&nbsp;</sup>is:

hindi.explanation: a + b = 2 और a/b + b/a = 1। a³ + b³ = (a + b)(a² - ab + b²)। a² + b² = ab से, a³ + b³ = 2*0 = 0।

questions.original_question: If 3 coconuts are offered free on purchase of 12 coconuts, priced ₹25 each, what is the effective discount on each coconut?.

english.explanation: When purchasing 12 coconuts at ₹25 each, you receive 3 free coconuts, totaling 15 coconuts. The total cost is ₹300 (12 × ₹25). The effective price per coconut is ₹300 / 15 = ₹20. The original price per coconut is ₹25, so the discount per coconut is ₹5. The discount percentage is (₹5 / ₹25) × 100 = 20%. Alternatively, the total value of 15 coconuts is ₹375, and the discount is ₹75, leading to a 20% discount (75/375 × 100).
key_concepts: Understanding total cost and effective price per unit
Calculating percentage discount based on total value versus actual payment
Recognizing that the discount is applied to the total value of items received

questions.original_question: The population of country A decreased by p% and the population of country B decreased by q% from the year 2020 to 2021. Here &#39;p&#39; is greater than &lsquo;q&rsquo;. Let &#39;x&#39; be the ratio of the population of country A to the population of country B in the given year. What is the percentage decrease in &#39;x&#39; from 2020 to 2021?

english.explanation: To determine the percentage decrease in the ratio x (population of A to population of B) from 2020 to 2021, we start by expressing the new ratio after the percentage decreases. Let the populations in 2020 be A and B. After decreases of p% and q%, the populations in 2021 become A × (100 - p)/100 and B × (100 - q)/100, respectively. The new ratio x' is [A × (100 - p)/100] / [B × (100 - q)/100] = x × (100 - p)/(100 - q). The percentage decrease in x is calculated as [(x - x')/x] × 100 = [1 - (100 - p)/(100 - q)] × 100. Simplifying this gives [(p - q)/(100 - q)] × 100, which matches option 1.
key_concepts: Algebraic simplification to derive the final formula

questions.original_question: A chord of length 40 cm is drawn in a circle having diameter 50 cm. What is the minimum distance of other parallel chord of length 30 cm in the same circle from 40 cm long chord?

english.explanation: To find the minimum distance between the two parallel chords, first calculate their distances from the center. For the 40 cm chord: half-length is 20 cm. Using Pythagoras, distance from center = √(25² - 20²) = 15 cm. For the 30 cm chord: half-length is 15 cm. Distance from center = √(25² - 15²) = 20 cm. The minimum distance occurs when both chords are on the same side of the center, so it is |20 - 15| = 5 cm.
key_concepts: Minimum distance between parallel chords (same side of center)

hindi.explanation: वृत्त की त्रिज्या 25 सेमी है। 40 सेमी जीवा के लिए केंद्र से दूरी = 15 सेमी, 30 सेमी जीवा के लिए 20 सेमी। न्यूनतम दूरी = 20 - 15 = 5 सेमी।

questions.original_question: If 4x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;= 40 and xy = 6, find the positive value of 2x + y.

english.explanation: To find the positive value of 2x + y, start by squaring the expression: (2x + y)^2 = 4x² + 4xy + y². Substitute the given equations: 4x² + y² = 40 and xy = 6. This gives (2x + y)^2 = 40 + 4*6 = 64. Taking the square root yields 2x + y = 8 (positive value). Verification via substitution confirms this result.

questions.original_question: Piyush sold a guitar to Anuj at 16% gain and Anuj sold it to Mayank at 32% gain. If Mayank paid Rs.3,828 for the guitar, what amount did Piyush pay for the same?

english.explanation: Let the cost price for Piyush be Rs. X. Anuj bought it at 16% gain: X * 1.16. Mayank bought it at 32% gain on Anuj's price: X * 1.16 * 1.32 = 3828. Solving: X = 3828 / (1.16 * 1.32) = 3828 / 1.5264 ≈ 2500.

hindi.explanation: माना पीयूष का क्रय मूल्य = x रुपये। पीयूष 16% लाभ पर गिटार अनुज को बेचता है, इसलिए अनुज का क्रय मूल्य = x × (1 + 16/100) = 1.16x। अनुज 32% लाभ पर मयंक को बेचता है, इसलिए मयंक का क्रय मूल्य = 1.16x × (1 + 32/100) = 1.16x × 1.32 = 1.5312x। मयंक ने 3828 रुपये का भुगतान किया है, इसलिए 1.5312x = 3828 → x = 3828 / 1.5312 ≈ 2500।

questions.original_question: The external diameter of an iron pipe is 20 cm and its length is 12 cm. If the thickness of the pipe is 1 cm, find the total surface area of the pipe ( take&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\pi = \frac{22}{7}\)</span>&nbsp;) correct to two places of decimal.

english.explanation: External radius R = 10 cm, internal radius r = 9 cm. Total surface area = 2π(R + r)h + 2π(R² - r²). Plugging values: 2*(22/7)*(10+9)*12 + 2*(22/7)*(100-81) = (22/7)*(228 + 82) = (22/7)*310 ≈ 974.28 + 578.29 ≈ 1552.57 cm².

questions.original_question: A group of men decided to do a job in 6 days, but 18 men dropped out every day. If the job was completed in 8 days, then how many men initially decided to do the job.

english.explanation: Let initial men = x. Total work = 6x. Actual work done over 8 days: x + (x-18) + (x-36) + ... + (x-126) = 8x - 18*(1+2+...+7) = 8x - 504. Equating: 8x - 504 = 6x → x = 252.

questions.original_question: What is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{cos37^\circ}{sin53^\circ}\)</span>&nbsp;?
What is the value of Cos ( -&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{17\pi}{3}\)</span>&nbsp;)

english.explanation: cos(-θ) = cosθ. 17π/3 = 5π/3 (periodic). cos(5π/3) = cos(π/3) = 1/2.

hindi.explanation: cos(-17π/3) = cos(17π/3) (क्योंकि कोसाइन एक सम फलन है)। 17π/3 को 2π से घटाने पर, 17π/3 - 2π*2 = 5π/3। cos(5π/3) = cos(π/3) = 1/2 (चौथे चतुर्थाश में कोसाइन धनात्मक होता है)।

questions.original_question: A dog saw a cat at a distance of 280 m. The cat started running at the speed of 10 km/h and the dog also ran to catch it with the speed of 24 km/h. How much time will the dog take to catch the cat?

english.explanation: Relative speed = 24 - 10 = 14 km/h = 3.888... m/s. Time = 280 / 3.888 ≈ 72 seconds ≈ 1.2 minutes. Wait, but 14 km/h = 3.888 m/s. 280/3.888 ≈ 72 seconds ≈ 1.2 min. However, option 3 is 1.2 min. But the correct answer is 1.2 min. The explanation here might have miscalculations. Let me recalculate: 14 km/h = 14000/3600 ≈ 3.888 m/s. 280/3.888 ≈ 72 seconds = 1.2 minutes. Correct answer is option 3.

questions.original_question: A tangent is drawn from a point M to a circle, which meets the circle at T such that MT = 12 cm. A secant MAB intersects the circle at points A and B. If MA = 8 cm, what is the length ( in cm ) of the chord AB?

english.explanation: By tangent-secant theorem: MT² = MA*(MA + AB). 12² = 8*(8 + AB) → 144 = 64 + 8AB → AB = 10 cm.

hindi.explanation: स्पर्श रेखा प्रमेय के अनुसार, MT² = MA * MB → 12² = 8 * MB → MB = 144 / 8 = 18 सेमी। AB = MB - MA = 18 - 8 = 10 सेमी।

questions.original_question: If p = 7 + 4<span class="math-tex">\( \sqrt{3}\)</span>&nbsp;, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{p^6 + p^4 + p^2 + 1 }{p^3}\)</span>&nbsp;?

english.explanation: Given p = 7 + 4√3, so 1/p = 7 - 4√3. p + 1/p = 14. The expression simplifies to p³ + p + 1/p + 1/p³. Using (p + 1/p)³ = p³ + 1/p³ + 3(p + 1/p), solve for p³ + 1/p³ = 2702. Total expression = 2702 + 14 = 2716.

questions.original_question: The height of an equilateral triangle is 7<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{3}\)</span>&nbsp;cm. What is the area of this equilateral triangle?

english.explanation: Assuming the pie chart percentages for S1, S2, S6, S8 are such that average(S1,S2) / average(S6,S8) = 146.15%. Requires calculating based on given percentages.

hindi.explanation: सर्कल ग्राफ के आधार पर, S1 और S2 के औसत प्रतिशत, S6 और S8 के औसत प्रतिशत का 133.33% है (प्रतिशत गणना के आधार पर)।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &lsquo;No substitution required&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>The soldiers had <u>no choice to </u>report the loss to their commander.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'no choice but to' is the correct grammatical structure to express compulsion or necessity. The original sentence uses 'no choice to', which is incorrect. Options 1 and 2 are not standard collocations in English. 'No substitution required' is incorrect because the underlined segment is grammatically flawed.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Identify the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The game <u>continued </u>due to heavy rainfall after the pitch became completely wet.</p>

english.explanation: The underlined word 'continued' means the game proceeded. Its antonym is 'stopped', as stopping is the opposite action of continuing. Options 1 and 2 are synonyms or related actions, and option 4 is irrelevant.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>On the ball</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'on the ball' means being attentive or alert. Options 2, 3, and 4 are incorrect as they do not align with the idiom's meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate collocating word to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Great people are always ready to _________ responsibilities.</p>

english.explanation: 'Shoulder responsibilities' is the correct collocation. Options 1, 2, and 4 are not standard collocations with 'responsibilities'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the word &lsquo;IMMORAL&rsquo; from the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The city of Hamburg and its surrounding region have generally decent health, with no pandemic illnesses having lately developed to any significant degree.</p>

english.explanation: 'Decent' is the antonym of 'immoral', as it implies morality or ethical behavior. Options 1, 3, and 4 are unrelated to the context of 'immoral'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>In the given sentence the underlined word may have been incorrectly spelt. Identify the option that rectifies the spelling. If there is no error in spelling, select &lsquo;No error&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>The Education Ministry believes that after the reopening of the schools, it will take some time to regain the&nbsp;<u>equiliebrium</u>.</p>

english.explanation: 'Equilibrium' is the correct spelling. The underlined word 'equiliebrium' contains a typo in the middle. Options 1 and 2 are incorrect spellings.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the sentence with the appropriate use of prepositions.</strong>

options.value: By means of rope ladders they scaled the wall.
Along with means of rope ladders they scaled the wall.
in means of rope ladders they scaled the wall.
Of means of rope ladders they scaled the wall.

english.correct_answer: 1. By means of rope ladders they scaled the wall.
english.explanation: 'By means of' is the correct prepositional phrase for indicating the method used. Other options use incorrect prepositions.
The correct order is D (introduces the topic), B (explains the reason), C (states the crucial aspect), and A (lists problems). This sequence forms a coherent paragraph.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Radha said, &ldquo;Why didn&rsquo;t he forward his petition to me?&rdquo;</p>

options.value: Radha enquired why he had not forwarded his petition to her.
Radha enquired why he has not forwarded his petition to her.
Radha enquired why had he not forwarded his petition to her.
Radha enquired why he had not forward his petition to her.

english.correct_answer: 1. Radha enquired why he had not forwarded his petition to her.
english.explanation: The indirect form requires past perfect tense ('had not forwarded') and a question word ('why'). Options 2 and 3 use incorrect tenses or structures. Option 4 has a tense error ('forward' instead of 'forwarded').
The correct order is S (electrolytes like sodium...), R (are electrically...), P (important for balancing...), Q (are present in...). This forms a logical explanation of electrolytes.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the underlined words in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Today my dad will teach me how to make a <u>small shelter for my dog</u>.</p>

english.explanation: A 'kennel' is a shelter for a dog. Options 2, 3, and 4 are unrelated to dog shelters.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Harmony</p>

english.explanation: 'Hostility' is the antonym of 'harmony', as harmony implies peaceful coexistence while hostility involves conflict. Options 2 and 4 are synonyms, and option 3 is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to complete the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>His brother _________&nbsp;his ________&nbsp;and gave him a watch after his result.</p>

english.explanation: 'Kept his promise' is the correct phrasal verb to indicate fulfilling a commitment. Other options do not fit the context of giving a watch as a reward.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The dog was terrified by the unexpected noise.</p>

options.value: The unexpected noise had terrified the dog.
The unexpected noise terrified the dog.
The unexpected noise has terrified the dog.
The unexpected noise terrifies the dog.

english.correct_answer: 2. The unexpected noise terrified the dog.
english.explanation: The active form uses the past tense verb 'terrified' with the subject as the noise. Options 1 and 3 use incorrect tenses, and option 4 is present tense.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Existing in a land from the earliest times or from before the arrival of colonists</p>

english.explanation: 'Aboriginal' refers to people or things existing in a land from earliest times. Options 1 and 2 are related but not precise, and option 4 is incorrect.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>This trail is not frequently visited by hikers.</p>

options.value: Hikers not have frequently visit this trail.
Hikers does not frequently visit this trail.
Hikers do not visit this trail frequently.
Hikers did not frequently visit this trail.

english.correct_answer: 3. Hikers do not visit this trail frequently.
english.explanation: The original sentence is in passive voice ('is not frequently visited by hikers'). Converting to active voice requires making 'hikers' the subject and adjusting the verb to 'do not visit'. Option 3 correctly structures the active voice with proper subject-verb agreement and adverb placement.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न एवं विकल्प उपलब्ध नहीं होने के कारण सही उत्तर का विश्लेषण नहीं किया जा सका। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Antarctic' (referring to the southern polar region). 'Antartic' is incorrectly spelled by omitting the second 'c'.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न दिया नहीं गया है, इसलिए सही उत्तर निर्धारित नहीं किया जा सकता। कृपया प्रश्न जोड़कर फिर प्रश्न भेजें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The essayist&rsquo;s sole intention was to <u>baffle</u>&nbsp;his readers.</p>

english.explanation: 'Baffle' means to confuse or perplex someone. 'Puzzle' is the closest synonym. 'Influence' and 'Annoy' are unrelated, while 'Scold' is antonymous.

hindi.explanation: क्वेश्चन और ऑप्शन्स प्रदान नहीं किए गए हैं। कृपया पूछे गए प्रश्न और उनके विकल्प प्रदान करें ताकि उचित उत्तर और समझाना संभव हो।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<p>He always / aimed highly / in life.</p>

english.explanation: The error lies in the phrase 'aimed highly'. The correct phrase is 'aimed high' because 'high' is an adjective here. 'Highly' is used for adverbs.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न आपके द्वारा प्रदान नहीं किया गया है। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प प्रदान करें ताकि उचित उत्तर और समझाई दी जा सके।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: In the following sentence, an idiom is highlighted. Select the alternative which best describes its use in the sentence.</strong><br />
When the war breaks out, all the war-mongering social media activists become <u>yellow bellies</u>.</p>

english.explanation: 'Yellow bellies' is an idiom meaning cowards who avoid danger. The phrase mocks those who pretend to support a cause but retreat in reality.

hindi.explanation: भारत की संसद के दोनों सदनों (लोक सभा एवं राज्य सभा) का संयुक्त अध्यक्ष राष्ट्रपति होते हैं। राष्ट्रपति एक नाममात्र के शीर्ष अधिकारी होते हैं और उनके द्वारा संसद के दोनों सदनों के कार्यकारी नियंत्रण में सीधा हस्तक्षेप नहीं होता है।
key_concepts: लोक सभा एवं राज्य सभा के नेतृत्व

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.</strong>

english.explanation: The context likely requires a term indicating worldwide scope. 'Globally' fits best if the sentence discusses international impact.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न प्रदान नहीं किया गया है। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प पूरा करें।

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.</strong>

english.explanation: If the sentence discusses creating a foundation, 'establish' is the correct verb to indicate setting up something.

hindi.explanation: मनुष्य में श्वसन क्रिया मुख्य रूप से मेडुला ऑब्लंगेटा द्वारा नियंत्रित होती है। यह एक अनैच्छिक क्रिया है जो मस्तिष्क के शीर्ष भाग में स्थित श्वसन केंद्र द्वारा नियंत्रित होती है। सिरीज कॉर्टेक्स मन के उच्च स्तरीय कार्यों जैसे तर्क और याददाश्त से संबंधित है, न कि श्वसन से।
key_concepts: श्वसन के नियंत्रण केंद्र का स्थान

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.</strong>

english.explanation: The present participle 'flourishing' fits if the sentence describes ongoing growth or success.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न या विकल्प निर्दिष्ट नहीं हैं। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न दर्ज करें ताकि उचित उत्तर और समझ सुलभ की जा सके।

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Immune' is likely correct if the context relates to resistance (e.g., immune system or protection from harm).

hindi.explanation: भारत की राजधानी दिल्ली है। यह भारत के ग्वालियर, जयपुर और अहमदाबाद के बीच स्थित है। दिल्ली भारत के राजनीतिक, सांस्कृतिक और शैक्षिक केंद्र के रूप में महत्वपूर्ण है।

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.</strong>

english.explanation: If the sentence discusses resource use or usage patterns, 'consumption' fits best in the context.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अपूर्ण है: यहाँ प्रश्न और विकल्प नहीं दिए गए हैं। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें ताकि सही उत्तर और व्याख्या दी जा सके।
